Title: IBM Fix packs for DataPower Gateway version 7.7 - United States

Text:
 DOWNLOAD

ABSTRACT
Lists of fixes in fix packs for IBM DataPower Gateway version 7.7.

DOWNLOAD DESCRIPTION
Fix packs and firmware images are located in Fix Central.

 * In IBM Knowledge Center you can find information about new and changed features, limitations, and restrictions.
 * For new features, see What's new [http://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SS9H2Y_7.7.0/com.ibm.dp.doc/whats_new.html].
 * For changes, see What's changed [http://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SS9H2Y_7.7.0/com.ibm.dp.doc/whats_changed.html].
 * For limitations and restrictions, see the Release notes [http://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SS9H2Y_7.7.0/com.ibm.dp.doc/releasenotes.html].
 * To download fix packs, go to the Fix Central website [http://www.ibm.com/support/fixcentral/].


Important: 

 * Before you install any fix pack or firmware image, review the DataPower Knowledge Collection on firmware updates. [http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27015333]
 * For information about how to download DataPower fix packs from Fix Central, see the Fix download method [http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21376557] technote.




 * 7.7.1.2 Replacement CD image for 7.7.1.1
 * 7.7.1.1 Replacement CD image for 7.7.1.0
 * 7.7.1.0 Replacement CD image for 7.7.0.x and includes all APARs in the 7.6.0.7 fix pack
 * 7.7.0.2 Fix pack for 7.7.0.x
 * 7.7.0.1 Fix pack for 7.7.0.x
 * 7.7.0.0 Initial CD image for 7.7.0.x and Includes all APARs in the 7.6.0.6 fix pack.
